titleStmt.title: Miqra ̕qadōsh The Holy Scripture : bethab e̕meth, the Scripture of truth, ta iera grammata the Holy letters : a grammatical opening of some Hebrew words and phrases in the beginning of the Bible .. by the same author.
titleStmt.author: Bampfield, Francis, 1615 or 16-1683.

notesStmt.note: First 2 words of title in Hebrew characters.
Caption title: A grammatical opening of some Hebrew words and phrases in the beginning of the Bible.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
